# banner_nicou11


## **Usage**

```
$ nicou11-banner

    _   ___                 ______
   / | / (_)________  __  _<  <  /
  /  |/ / / ___/ __ \/ / / / // /
 / /|  / / /__/ /_/ / /_/ / // /
/_/ |_/_/\___/\____/\__,_/_//_/



$ nicou11-lotto
[17, 45, 25, 26, 23, 5]



$ nicou11-pic
```
